123.title: Lab session with microrobots
123.description: This micro-credential is designed for advanced learners in Robotics, focusing on practical experience with microrobots, specifically the Epuck2, programmed in Python and MicroPython.

learningObjectives: Understand the fundamental concepts and operational principles of microrobots, particularly the Epuck2.
Acquire proficiency in programming microrobots using Python and MicroPython.
Apply theoretical knowledge to design and implement practical control strategies for microrobots in a lab environment.

modules.name: Module 1: Introducción a los mini-robots
topics: Introduction to Epuck2 robot hardware and capabilities

assessment.requirements: Participants must complete all assessments with a passing grade.

capstoneProject.description: A final project demonstrating microrobot programming and collaborative tasks.
